bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Codeblocks segfault when start
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): codeblocks-13.12-23.fc24.x86_64 wxGTK-2.8.12-23.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: start codeblocks
Additional info:
backtrace: #0 0x00007ffff525c5d3 in wxStringBase::operator=(wxStringBase const&) () at /lib64/libwx_baseu-2.8.so.0 #1 0x00007ffff7a8f761 in wxPGProperty::Init(wxString const&, wxString const&) () at /lib64/libcodeblocks.so.0 #2 0x00007ffff7a9df15 in wxPGProperty::wxPGProperty(wxString const&, wxString const&) () at /lib64/libcodeblocks.so.0 #3 0x00007ffff7ab9255 in wxStringProperty::wxStringProperty(wxString const&, wxString const&, wxString const&) () at /lib64/libcodeblocks.so.0 #4 0x0000555555665bee in WatchesDlg::WatchesDlg() () #5 0x00005555555d06f5 in DebugInterfaceFactory::CreateWatches() () #6 0x00007ffff777eb5d in DebuggerManager::CreateWindows() () at /lib64/libcodeblocks.so.0 #7 0x00007ffff777ec2d in DebuggerManager::SetInterfaceFactory(cbDebugInterfaceFactory*) () at /lib64/libcodeblocks.so.0 #8 0x000055555560f294 in MainFrame::SetupDebuggerUI() () #9 0x000055555562089f in MainFrame::CreateIDE() () #10 0x000055555562449b in MainFrame::MainFrame(wxWindow*) () #11 0x00005555555be814 in CodeBlocksApp::InitFrame() () #12 0x00005555555c03c1 in CodeBlocksApp::OnInit() () #13 0x00007ffff523d3a7 in wxEntry(int&, wchar_t**) () at /lib64/libwx_baseu-2.8.so.0 #14 0x00005555555af972 in main ()
The bug is the same with the nightly build version of codeblocks fromjenslody-codeblocks repo : https://copr-be.cloud.fedoraproject.org/results/jenslody/codeblocks/fedora-$releasever-$basearch/

Similar problem has been detectet
kernel: codeblocks[4266]: segfault at 0 ip 00007f78ce0895d3 sp 00007ffed2525f98 error 4 in libwx_baseu-2.8.so.0.8.0[7f78cdfd4000+14c000] abrt-hook-ccpp: Process 4266 (codeblocks) of user 1000 killed by SIGSEGV - dumping core abrt-server: Deleting problem directory ccpp-2016-07-06-08:51:57-4266 (dup of ccpp-2016-07-05-11:42:58-6978)
Kernel : 4.6.3-300.fc24.x86_64
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
codeblocks-16.01-1.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-876fecb8cc
codeblocks-16.01-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-d63b2f5faf

codeblocks-16.01-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates.
